item.title: Text Encoding Initiative (TEI) Fun with Henry James's _The Turn of the Screw_
item.description: My English Department colleague, Dr. Anna Ioanes, is teaching the standard course in “Critical Theory” this semester and students have been working their way through Henry James’s The Turn of the Screw over the last few weeks. Somehow—not exactly sure how—I managed to forget how incredibly rich this text is and this is not even to mention the rich secondary criticism produced by this short little novella.
